biography: Yasuhiro Yoshiura is a Japanese writer and director of animated short films. Born in 1980 in Hokkaido, and raised in Fukuoka, he graduated from Kyushu University's Faculty of Design (formerly Kyushu Institute of Design) in 2003. He moved to Tokyo following the release of his critically acclaimed film Pale Cocoon  in 2006. Yoshiura's production company is called Studio Rikka. He often  also provides the voice of a minor character in his works.
name: Yasuhiro Yoshiura
